text:
At the following pages:

http://httpd.apache.org/docs/trunk/mod/quickreference.html
http://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.2/mod/quickreference.html

The second columns shows the default value of the directive, if a default exists. If the default is too large to display, the first characters will be followed by "+".

"+" is not the first character, is the ending character. Maybe we should update to:

The second columns shows the default value of the directive, if a default exists. If the default is too large to display, it will be truncated, and the ending characters will be followed by "+".
creator: dongsheng@apache.org
